segments.pli: Saṃyutta Nikāya 15
segments.en: Linked Discourses 15

segments.pli: 1. Paṭhamavagga
segments.en: 1. The First Chapter

segments.pli: 8. Gaṅgāsutta
segments.en: 8. The Ganges

segments.pli: Rājagahe viharati veḷuvane.
segments.en: Near Rājagaha, in the Bamboo Grove.

segments.pli: Atha kho aññataro brāhmaṇo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavatā saddhiṃ sammodi.
segments.en: Then a certain brahmin went up to the Buddha, and exchanged greetings with him.

segments.pli: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho so brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
segments.en: When the greetings and polite conversation were over, he sat down to one side and asked the Buddha,

segments.pli: “kīvabahukā nu kho, bho gotama, kappā abbhatītā atikkantā”ti?
segments.en: “Sir, how many eons have passed?”

segments.pli: “Bahukā kho, brāhmaṇa, kappā abbhatītā atikkantā.
segments.en: “Brahmin, many eons have passed.

segments.pli: Te na sukarā saṅkhātuṃ:
segments.en: It’s not easy to calculate

segments.pli: ‘ettakā kappā iti vā, ettakāni kappasatāni iti vā, ettakāni kappasahassāni iti vā, ettakāni kappasatasahassāni iti vā’”ti.
segments.en: how many eons have passed, how many hundreds or thousands or hundreds of thousands of eons.”

segments.pli: “Sakkā pana, bho gotama, upamaṃ kātun”ti?
segments.en: “But sir, can you give a simile?”

segments.pli: “Sakkā, brāhmaṇā”ti bhagavā avoca.
segments.en: “I can,” said the Buddha.

segments.pli: “Seyyathāpi, brāhmaṇa, yato cāyaṃ gaṅgā nadī pabhavati yattha ca mahāsamuddaṃ appeti, yā etasmiṃ antare vālikā sā na sukarā saṅkhātuṃ:
segments.en: “Consider the Ganges river from where it originates to where it enters the ocean. Between these places it’s not easy to calculate

segments.pli: ‘ettakā vālikā iti vā, ettakāni vālikasatāni iti vā, ettakāni vālikasahassāni iti vā, ettakāni vālikasatasahassāni iti vā’ti.
segments.en: how many grains of sand there are, how many hundreds or thousands or hundreds of thousands of grains of sand.

segments.pli: Tato bahutarā kho, brāhmaṇa, kappā abbhatītā atikkantā.
segments.en: The eons that have passed are more than this.

segments.pli: Te na sukarā saṅkhātuṃ:
segments.en: It’s not easy to calculate

segments.pli: ‘ettakā kappā iti vā, ettakāni kappasatāni iti vā, ettakāni kappasahassāni iti vā, ettakāni kappasatasahassāni iti vā’ti.
segments.en: how many eons have passed, how many hundreds or thousands or hundreds of thousands of eons.

segments.pli: Taṃ kissa hetu?
segments.en: Why is that?

segments.pli: Anamataggoyaṃ, brāhmaṇa, saṃsāro.
segments.en: Transmigration has no known beginning.

segments.pli: Pubbā koṭi na paññāyati avijjānīvaraṇānaṃ sattānaṃ taṇhāsaṃyojanānaṃ sandhāvataṃ saṃsarataṃ.
segments.en: No first point is found of sentient beings roaming and transmigrating, hindered by ignorance and fettered by craving.

segments.pli: Evaṃ dīgharattaṃ kho, brāhmaṇa, dukkhaṃ paccanubhūtaṃ tibbaṃ paccanubhūtaṃ byasanaṃ paccanubhūtaṃ, kaṭasī vaḍḍhitā.
segments.en: For such a long time you have undergone suffering, agony, and disaster, swelling the cemeteries.

segments.pli: Yāvañcidaṃ, brāhmaṇa, alameva sabbasaṅkhāresu nibbindituṃ, alaṃ virajjituṃ, alaṃ vimuccitun”ti.
segments.en: This is quite enough for you to become disillusioned, dispassionate, and freed regarding all conditions.”

segments.pli: Evaṃ vutte, so brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
segments.en: When he said this, the brahmin said to the Buddha,

segments.pli: “abhikkantaṃ, bho gotama, abhikkantaṃ, bho gotama … pe …
segments.en: “Excellent, Master Gotama! Excellent! …

segments.pli: upāsakaṃ maṃ bhavaṃ gotamo dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṃ saraṇaṃ gatan”ti.
segments.en: From this day forth, may Master Gotama remember me as a lay follower who has gone for refuge for life.”

segments.pli: Aṭṭhamaṃ.

sections.title: Near Rājagaha, in the Bamboo Grove.

suttaplex.blurb: There have been more eons than the sands in the Ganges river.
